description:
Djeco presents Zig & Go, a wooden building game of chain reactions requiring careful thinking. Children copy the 3 designs in the instructions booklet to build courses, or make up their own - the possibilities are endless! This game is designed for ages 7 and over, and all the kits in the collection are compatible, for ever more inventive action-reaction courses!

  Construction game: children will need to use skill to position the pieces to make a course.
 Chain reaction game: children get to learn about the ingenuity and magic of chains of movement! 
 Thinking game: children need to think about how fast pieces will move - which depends on the weight - and gauge the distances between them.
 Step-by-step instructions for 3 designs are provided to help children build their courses.
 Video accessible via a QR code.
 Invent endless courses for hours of fun!
 Play alone or with others.
 FSC® certified wood.

 1 48-piece wooden building game with 5 metal marbles. Contents 1 24-page instructions booklet.

 Age 8+

Zig & Go Big Boom 48 Piece Chain Reaction Building Game for Imaginative Fun Get ready for explosive creativity and captivating fun with the Zig & Go Big Boom 48 piece set from Djeco! This isn't just any building game; it's a thrilling journey into the world of chain reactions where thoughtful planning and imaginative design come to life. Inside this wonderfully crafted set, you'll discover 48 high-quality wooden pieces, all FSC certified for peace of mind, alongside 5 gleaming metal marbles that will be the stars of your spectacular domino-style courses. The adventure begins with a colorful 24-page instruction booklet that features three fantastic designs to spark your building genius. These designs are perfect for copying and understanding the amazing physics of cause and effect. But that's just the beginning! The real magic unfolds when you start creating your very own courses, the possibilities are truly endless, offering hours upon hours of engaging entertainment for the whole family. This game is specifically designed for young masterminds aged 7 and above, nurturing their problem-solving skills and encouraging them to think critically about how different weights and distances will affect the speed and flow of their creations. As children meticulously position each piece, they're developing valuable construction skills. Then, when the marbles start rolling, they witness the ingenious and magical chain of movements firsthand, learning about physics in a hands-on, exciting way. The process encourages deep thinking as they consider momentum and gravity, turning simple wood into a spectacle of motion. For even more spectacular setups, all kits within the Zig & Go collection are designed to be compatible, allowing you to expand your chain reaction world with new challenges and elaborate designs. If you ever need a little extra guidance or inspiration, a special QR code is provided, unlocking access to helpful videos that demonstrate the amazing capabilities of these sets. Whether you're playing solo and concentrating on perfecting a complex cascade, or collaborating with friends and family to build the most epic course imaginable, the Zig & Go Big Boom set promises collaborative fun and individual discovery. It's more than just a toy; it's an educational tool that makes learning about physics and engineering an absolute delight.

description:
Playfoam is a completely mess free creative play resource that is great for sensory play.

 This bumper pack of 20 pods makes a great play set for groups of children or even parties!

 This Learning Resources award winning product helps develop fine motor skills for little hands. The non toxic formula makes this best selling Playfoam great for safe creative play. It doesn't stick to hands, clothes or carpet, just to itself!

 
What's even better is Playfoam never dries out, so children can display their masterpieces rather than having to put it all back in the box!

 
Children simply mould Playfoam into anything in their imagination before squashing it down and starting again, offering endless play opportunities.

 
Set of 20 individual 9cm pods in 8 vibrant colours, including sparkle
Possible colour transfer: Playfoam® may transfer colour stain to fabric and plastic. Stains can be removed from tabletops using olive oil.

Analyse solids and liquids, make a fluorescent solution, inspect invisible ink, lift fingerprints, look for counterfeit notes, and examine ink using chromatography. The experiments are accompanied by exciting stories of make-believe mysteries and crimes to solve.
